title: Calendar Constraint
description: A calendar constraint is a component of a decision option that defines the date range when option is valid. Outside that date range the option cannot be proposed.

xdm:startDate.title: Start Date & Time
xdm:startDate.description: The start date of an option. Options that have not reached their start date are not yet considered eligible in the decisioning.

xdm:endDate.title: End Date & Time
xdm:endDate.description: The end date of an option. Options that have passed their end date are no longer considered eligible in the decisioning process.
